page.title: 07PRIMARY SCHOOLS in PENICUIK
page.content: These are the Primary Schools in our block:- {Eastfield,}a traditional school on 3 floors- built in 1956. It has 362 pupils at present ,14 class teachers and 8 visiting teachers.There is the head teacher, a secretary, a janitor, 8 kitchen staff and 5 cleaners.Activities held in the evening include keep fit, badminton, Brownies, Guides, pipe band and the Rural Women's Institute. {Cuiken,}again traditional- built 1958. It has 276 pupils, 11 class teachers and 5 visiting teachers.It is like Eastfield in its other staff and activities. {Cornbank,}traditional-built in 1968. It has 453 pupils, 16 class teachers, 5 visiting teachers and again similar in other aspects. (see next page)
